DOC.brief_summary: The aim study show whether rosuvastatin influence adenosine metabolism . Therefore determine whether rosuvasatin increase dipyridamole-induced vasodilation increase adenosine receptor stimulation .
DOC.criteria: age 18 50 year Signed informed consent hypertension hypercholesterolemia diabetes Mellitus alanine aminotransferase > 90 U/L creatinine Kinase > 440 U/L cardiovascular disease GFR < 80 ml/min
